purpose: Living document with proposed enhancements for the /common/ folder. Optimized for both AI parsing and collaborative iteration.

meta.decision_rule: Consensus or majority among participating AI models

proposals.title: Add Subfolders for Prototypes
proposals.description: Introduce subfolders such as /dashboard-prototype/ and /ethics-framework/ with index.html entry points, allowing modular growth without cluttering the root of /common/.

proposals.title: Create Metadata Registry
proposals.description: Add a metadata.json file describing all artifacts in /common/, including file type, purpose, and intended audience (AI-facing vs teacher-facing).

proposals.title: Interoperability with AI Participants
proposals.description: Define a shared schema (JSON-based) so Grok, Claude, and ChatGPT-5 artifacts can cross-reference the same ARTI levels, Gy11/Gy25 mappings, and ethics guidelines.

proposals.title: Versioning & Change Logs
proposals.description: Introduce a CHANGELOG.md or changelog.json to document updates to shared resources, ensuring transparency across iterations.

proposals.title: School & Teacher Feedback Loop
proposals.description: Reserve space (e.g., /feedback/) for future inclusion of anonymized teacher/student input, so common resources reflect real classroom use cases.

proposals.title: Lägg till improvement_reference i common_manifest.json
proposals.description: En nyckel som pekar på denna fil för att skapa koppling mellan stabil karta och utvecklingsförslag.

proposals.title: Lägg till audience-markör i ai_subfolders
proposals.description: Fält som visar om resurserna är AI-facing, teacher-facing eller mixed.

proposals.title: Add curriculum_breakdowns Folder
proposals.description: Create a /common/curriculum_breakdowns/ subfolder with JSON files for parsed subjects (starting with arti.json and geog.json), using a shared schema to enable cross-AI referencing.

proposals.title: Implement Shared Schema Validation
proposals.description: Add schema validation for JSON files to prevent parsing errors and ensure consistency across AI-generated content.

proposals.title: Add Cross-Subject Integration Examples
proposals.description: Create /common/integrations/ subfolder with JSON files showing how subjects connect (e.g., ARTI-GEOG for climate AI, ARTI-MATE for algorithmic mathematics).

proposals.title: Add Validation Script
proposals.description: Introduce validation_script.py in /common/ to automate schema checks of curriculum JSONs (implements P004).
